summary:
Papua New Guinea is an Oceanian country made up of the eastern half of New Guinea island and nearby islands. It borders Indonesia, Australia, and the Solomon Islands. The capital is Port Moresby. With over 800 languages, it's the world's most linguistically diverse country. Most people live in traditional communities, and many are subsistence farmers.

The country has a history of colonial rule and was an important site during World War II. It gained independence in 1975 and is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations and the United Nations. Papua New Guinea is known for its rich biodiversity and is a developing economy.
title: Papua New Guinea
